mapper.select: /* MEMO_QUERY.selectMemoList - 메모리스트 조회 */ SELECT dtbl.M_SEQ , dtbl.M_GRP , dtbl.TITLE , dtbl.CONTENTS , utbl.USER_NICKNAME , ctbl.CATEGORY_NAME , dtbl.M_CHECK , dtbl.FST_REG_DTM , dtbl.LST_MOD_DTM , dtbl.DEL_YN , dtbl.M_PRNT_SEQ , dtbl.M_GRP_SEQ , dtbl.M_LEVEL FROM MEMO.DATA_TBL dtbl , MEMO.CATEGORY_TBL ctbl , MEMO.USER_TBL utbl WHERE dtbl.CATEGORY_ID = ctbl.CATEGORY_ID AND dtbl.USER_ID = utbl.USER_ID ORDER BY dtbl.M_GRP
